new_items.example_en: The odd clue piqued her curiosity.
new_items.example_zh: 那條古怪的線索激起了她的好奇。
new_items.label: new

new_items.en_definition: to feel or express great loathing for
new_items.example_zh: 民眾公開痛恨體制性的貪腐。
new_items.label: new

new_items.example_en: The essay felt jejune and superficial.
new_items.example_zh: 這篇文章顯得幼稚而淺薄。
new_items.label: new

new_items.en_definition: using too many words; tediously long
new_items.example_en: A prolix report buried the key points.
new_items.example_zh: 冗長的報告掩沒了重點。
new_items.label: new

new_items.example_en: She remained an implacable critic of the policy.
new_items.example_zh: 她始終是該政策不妥協的批評者。
new_items.label: new

new_items.example_en: He resigned under intense public opprobrium.
new_items.example_zh: 在強大輿論譴責下他辭職了。
new_items.label: new

new_items.en_definition: tending to change frequently; very versatile
new_items.example_en: A protean designer reinvented the interface.
new_items.example_zh: 那位多變的設計師改頭換面了介面。
new_items.label: new

new_items.en_definition: having or showing good judgment; wise
new_items.example_en: A sagacious mentor offered simple advice.
new_items.example_zh: 一位睿智的導師給了簡明建議。
new_items.label: new

new_items.example_en: She chose to dissemble about her next move.
new_items.example_zh: 她選擇對自己的下一步遮遮掩掩。
new_items.label: new

new_items.en_definition: to win or regain favor by doing something pleasing
new_items.example_en: They sent gifts to propitiate the client.
new_items.example_zh: 他們送禮以安撫客戶、求重修舊好。
new_items.label: new

new_items.example_en: A munificent gift kept the program alive.
new_items.example_zh: 一筆慷慨的捐助讓計畫得以延續。
new_items.label: new

new_items.en_definition: to reduce in force, effect, or thickness
new_items.example_en: Engineers attenuated the noise with better insulation.
new_items.example_zh: 工程師用更好的隔音來降低噪音。
new_items.label: new
